body: Your drow blood is particularly strong.
name: Half-Drow Paragon
url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Races/Half-Elves/New Racial Rules/Half-Elven Feats/Half-Drow Paragon

sections.body: Drow-blooded and drow magic racial traits, half-elf.
sections.name: Prerequisites

sections.body: You count as a drow for any effects that relate to race. Furthermore, the spell-like abilities granted to you by your drow magic racial trait count as drow spell-like abilities for the purposes of any feat prerequisites.
sections.name: Benefit
